where.if: AND hfml.credit_address in (SELECT region_id FROM ht_msp_region WHERE region_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{creditAddress}, '%'))

mapper.sql: id, configure_name, loan_type, service_type, approval_result, loan_money, loan_time_limit, credit_address, guarantee_type, unredeemed_money, repayment_status, overdue_amount, overdue_date, overdue_length, overdue_reason, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time
mapper.select: select id, configure_name, loan_type, service_type, approval_result, loan_money, loan_time_limit, credit_address, (select region_name from ht_msp_region hmr where hmr.region_id=hmc.credit_address) credit_addresss, guarantee_type, unredeemed_money, repayment_status, overdue_amount, overdue_date, overdue_length, overdue_reason, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from ht_msp_configure hmc where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ht_msp_configure (configure_name, loan_type, service_type, approval_result, loan_money, loan_time_limit, credit_address, guarantee_type, unredeemed_money, repayment_status, overdue_amount, overdue_date, overdue_length, overdue_reason, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{configureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loanTimeLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creditAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guaranteeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unredeemedMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repaymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overdueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{overdueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overdueLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{overdueReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ht_msp_configure set configure_name = #{configureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loan_type = #{loanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_type = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_result = #{approvalResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loan_money = #{loanMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, loan_time_limit = #{loanTimeLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, credit_address = #{creditAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, guarantee_type = #{guaranteeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unredeemed_money = #{unredeemedMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayment_status = #{repaymentStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, overdue_amount = #{overdueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, overdue_date = #{overdueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, overdue_length = #{overdueLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, overdue_reason = #{overdueReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
distinct
id, configure_name, loan_type, service_type, approval_result, loan_money, loan_time_limit, (select region_name from ht_msp_region hmr where hmr.region_id=hfml.credit_address) credit_address, guarantee_type, unredeemed_money, repayment_status, overdue_amount, overdue_date, overdue_length, overdue_reason, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, CASE loan_type WHEN '01' THEN '经营' WHEN '02' THEN '消费' WHEN '99' THEN '其他' ELSE '其他' END loan_type_name, CASE service_type WHEN '01' THEN '信用额度' WHEN '02' THEN '一般借贷' WHEN '03' THEN '消费信贷' WHEN '04' THEN '循环贷' WHEN '05' THEN '其他' ELSE '其他' END service_type_name, CASE approval_result WHEN '01' THEN '审批通过' WHEN '02' THEN '审批拒绝' WHEN '04' THEN '重新审批' WHEN '05' THEN '客户取消' ELSE '其他' END approval_result_name, CASE guarantee_type WHEN 'A' THEN '抵押' WHEN 'B' THEN '质押' WHEN 'C' THEN '担保' WHEN 'D' THEN '信用' WHEN 'E' THEN '保证' WHEN 'Y' THEN '其他' ELSE '其他' END guarantee_type_name, CASE repayment_status WHEN '01' THEN '正常' WHEN '02' THEN '逾期中' WHEN '03' THEN '逾期核销' WHEN '04' THEN '正常结清' ELSE '其他' END repayment_status_name FROM ht_msp_configure hfml
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}
